title: Garlic roast potatoes and asparagus
ingredients: ['700g red potatoes (such as Rooster), cut into chunks', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '8 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '4 teaspoons dried rosemary', '4 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 teaspoons sea salt, or to taste', '1 bunch fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
